'''Beta 1.19.60.27''' (Android) or '''Preview 1.19.60.27''' (Windows, iOS, iPadOS, Xbox) is the seventh and final beta/''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.19.60]], released on January 19, 2023,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/12379306982925|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.19.60.27|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=January 19, 2023}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
'''Gameplay'''
* Fixed a bug where enemies from "Spellrune" by [[Gamemode One]] didn't perform any melee attacks.
** This also fixed a bug which was present in older worlds which caused ravagers not to attack.
* Fixed a bug that could sometimes cause players to fall through the world after using [[End gateway|End Gateways]].
* Entities no longer disappear when sent through End Gateways. ({{bug|MCPE-164985}})
'''Performance and Stability'''
* Fixed a crash that could occur when sending entities through End Gateways. ({{bug|MCPE-165496}})
* Fixed an issue that occurred when trying to place items into a container output slot.
'''Player Skins'''
* Fixed a bug that prevented [[capes]] from appearing correctly on classic [[skins]]. ({{bug|MCPE-165986}})
'''User Interface'''
* Fixed a bug where players sometimes can only see a black screen after switching back to the game from running other applications on iOS and iPadOS.</onlyinclude>
